articles.author: James Vincent
articles.title: Tesla workers in Shanghai will reportedly sleep and eat in the factory after COVID shutdowns - The Verge
articles.description: Tesla is restarting production at its Shanghai factory. As part of a “closed-loop system” encouraged by authorities to stem the spread of COVID-19, employees will reportedly work, sleep, and eat at the factory for more than a week at a time.
articles.content:
The measures are part of a close-loop system encouraged by authorities
Teslas Shanghai factory previously produced about 2,100 cars a day.
